results.title: KIND Brand Ambassador
results.description: What you'll do KBAs are part time KIND team members that are the face of the brand at various field marketing events including in-store sampling demos (3 per week, mainly weekday nights and weekends, 2 -3 hours per demo.) Organization and hosting of in-store retail demos Coordination with store managers and demo coordinators on schedules, product levels and demo guidelines Create a unique customer experience to increase brand awareness and build customer loyalty Capture demo results by timely r…
